response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder kenntnis? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent or knowledge? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post criticizes the fact that many companies still collect and use personal data without proper consent or transparency. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security highlight the importance of protecting personal information and the need for better security measures to prevent data breaches and misuse of personal data.
